title: Chapter 4497 - Chapter 4497: 4496 Was Born
body:
Chapter 4497 - Chapter 4497: 4496 Was Born

Chapter 4497: 4496 was born

Time passed by little by little.

The entire flaming meteorite shrank smaller and smaller.

The thumping sound that sounded like the beating of a heart became stronger and stronger.

The Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens was being reborn.

It was being born!

Gradually, when the flaming meteorite was about 10,000 meters away, Wang Xian sensed that the experts around him were starting to get restless!

The seven experts at the primal chaos level were accumulating their own powerful energy and could erupt at any time!

Boom

However, not long after, a burst of flames suddenly burst out from the flaming meteorite that was about 10,000 meters in size.

The flames spread to the surroundings and formed a terrifying sea of flames!

The area of the Sea of flames was extremely huge!

“Chirp!”

Soon after, a weak cry sounded from within!

“Boom Boom Boom!”

“Boom Boom Boom!”

When this cry sounded out, it was like a signal for a great battle!

All the experts instantly moved.

Especially the primal chaos experts of the Giant Beast Alliance and the Ten Suns Alliance, they instantly charged forward.

However, they didn’t charge towards the Nine Heavens Divine Roc, but towards each other!

The three primal chaos realm experts of the ten days federation instantly arrived in front of the four primal chaos realm experts of the Behemoth Alliance.

Their terrifying energy directly covered the area.

They took the initiative to attack, wanting to use the strength of three people to temporarily block the strength of the other four.

Only under such circumstances could they obtain the Nine Heavens Divine Roc.

Otherwise, with their strength, it would be very difficult to obtain it!

“HMPH, three people trying to stop the four of us? Wishful Thinking!”

“Roar Roar Roar!”

The Primal Chaos Experts of the Beast Alliance harrumphed coldly.

They immediately activated their terrifying energy and swept towards the three primal chaos experts of the Ten Sun Alliance.

“Hmph, I can still hold you back for more than ten minutes. Don’t hold back and unleash all of your power!”

The primal chaos experts of the Spirit Universe roared loudly!

“Dong Dong Dong!”

“Dong Dong Dong!”

Endless energy erupted from their bodies and met the four primal Chaos Beasts of the Giant Beast Alliance!

“Today, I will let your giant Beast Alliance witness the power of this mechanical God!”

The chaos-level powerhouse from the Mechanical Ascension Universe let out a low roar.

A terrifying black hole appeared in his palm. The endless energy in the black hole covered the area in front of him.

It was abnormally terrifying!

“HMM? This chaos-level existence from the mechanical ascension universe is indeed not simple. When he explodes, he is even stronger than those from the supernatural universe!”

Wang Xian looked over and his eyes revealed a look of astonishment.

With the power of technology, it was already very terrifying to be able to reach this stage!

“Kill!”

“Kill!”

“Charge, charge towards the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens!”

At the back, all the great dao-level, control-level, and beginner-level powerhouses started to move.

They flew towards the Divine Roc of the nine heavens in a frenzy.

Chaotic-level existences had a battlefield. They could charge over with peace of mind!

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

However, when both parties were close to the area covered by the firepower, a terrifying energy directly covered them!

“Xiao Ming, follow me. Don’t die. Dying once will consume a powerful resurrection treasure.”

Wu Tongying and Wang Xian rushed forward together and said to him!

“Don’t worry, my strength is much stronger than yours!”

Wang Xian glanced at him and said indifferently.

Be It Wang Xian’s strength or Wu Tongming’s current strength, both of them were much stronger than Wu Tongying.

Even Wu Tongming’s parents were not as strong as Wu Tongming.

After all, he had an ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin!

“HMPH, you’ve just broken through. You’re getting a little cocky!”

“Charge! Dad, Mom, Grandpa, and the rest can’t take care of us. We have to rely on ourselves!”

Wu Tongying snorted coldly. He gathered his energy and charged towards the attack of the Behemoth Alliance!

Wang Xian didn’t take action immediately this time.

Although with his current strength, he only needed two teleportations to arrive in front of the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens.

However, Wang Xian had a feeling that it wasn’t as easy as he imagined to control this divine Roc of the Nine Heavens!

Of course, Wang Xian could also sense the weakness of the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens.

Perhaps, there was a slight possibility.

After all, if there was no possibility, the Behemoth Alliance and the Ten Suns Federation would mobilize so much power for this!

“Boom Boom Boom!”

“Boom Boom Boom!”

The collision began.

“Gather energy and suppress the other side!”

“Fire cannons, cover!”

From the front, the roars of the Great Dao experts could be heard.

If the ten-day federation wanted to snatch the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens, they had to first fend off the attacks of the Behemoth Alliance.

This way, they would have a chance to take advantage of the chaos.

Otherwise, they would not be able to compete with the Behemoth Alliance.

They could only take the lead and use all their strength.

Wang Xian controlled the energy in Wu Tongming’s body. He did not use the ultimate treasure of Heaven’s origin as he charged forward with all his strength.

At the side, Wu Tongying widened his eyes and looked at him in disbelief.

“How is this possible? Xiao Ming, you have stepped into another minor realm during this period of time? How is this possible?”

Wu Tongying felt Wang Xian’s strength and could not believe it!

It had been hundreds of millions of years since he broke through to the Heaven’s origin blessed realm, and he was still at the weakest level!

However, his younger brother was now stronger than him?

“Follow me. I will protect you. I have already said that I am much stronger than you!”

Wang Xian said to her faintly.

This made Wu Tongying Gape and was filled with questions.

However, this was not the time to get to the bottom of it!

Wang Xian sensed the entire battlefield.

At the chaos level, the three chaos level existences of the ten-day federation unleashed all their strength in an instant, restraining the four chaos level existences with great difficulty.

The position here was under the joint efforts of the experts of the ten-day federation.

In addition to the numerous battleships and mechs surrounding them, they were barely able to fend off the experts of the Behemoth Alliance.

However, Wang Xian knew that this was only temporary and would not last for long.

The strength of the Behemoth Alliance was much stronger than the ten-day federation!

Buzz! Buzz

At this moment, Wang Xian saw the clones of the powerhouses in front of him rushing toward the nine-heavens Divine Roc.

Clearly, the powerhouses of the ten-day federation had their own plans.

As for this plan, as a beginner-level powerhouse in the Heaven’s origin realm, he wasn’t qualified to know about it.

Wu Tongming’s parents didn’t inform him either.

In their opinion, a beginner-level powerhouse wouldn’t be of much use in this huge battle.

Wang Xian looked over and saw that he was still unmoving.

He was still following the powerhouses of the ten-day federation and fighting against the powerhouses of the Behemoth Alliance.

He knew that this kind of confrontation would not last long.

A chaotic battle, a chaotic battle, was about to begin!
